errors.missing_permissions: You don't have permission to use this command.
errors.user_quarantined: You are not allowed to upload emojis.
errors.server_quarantined: You can't use this command because this server is quarantined.
errors.user_or_guild_quarantined: You can't use this command because your account or this server is quarantined.
errors.server_owner_only: You must be the server owner to use this command.

errors.missing_bot_permissions: I don't have permission to upload emojis. Please make sure I have the "Manage Guild Expressions" and "Create Guild Expressions" permissions.

currently_uploading.message: I'm currently uploading the pack **{packName}**. Please wait until it's finished.

errors.pack_failed: Failed uploading {index}. emoji. Skipping.. **{remainingSeconds} seconds** remaining.

upload.reason: Uploaded by @{username} ({userId}) from pack {packId}. {index} of / {total} emojis.

errors.same_invite_code: Invite code is the same as the current one.
errors.missing_bot_permissions: I don't have permission to send messages in that channel.
errors.panel_server_not_listed: You can't set a panel channel without listing your server. Visit [here]({link}) to list this server.
errors.role_is_managed: You can't add a managed role as a reward.
errors.role_is_higher: You can't add a role higher or equal to my highest role as a reward.
errors.invalid_votes: Required votes must be at least 1.
errors.reward_server_not_listed: You can't add a reward without listing your server. Visit [here]({link}) to list this server.
errors.max_rewards_reached: You can't have more than {count} rewards.
errors.reward_exists: There is already a reward with that role.

errors.missing_bot_permissions: I don't have permission to add roles to users.

reward.added: New vote reward added! I will give {role} to users who reach **{requiredVotes}** votes.

errors.no_rewards: There are no rewards in this server.

logging_messages.reward_added: New reward {role} added by {user}. The role will be given to users who reach **{requiredVotes}** votes.

errors.too_many_currently: There are too many templates being applied at the moment. Please wait for the current templates to be applied before using another template.
errors.currently_applying: This server is currently applying a template. Please wait for the current template to be applied before using another template.
errors.server_wait_for_applying: Please wait {remainingMinutes} minutes before using another template in this server.
errors.user_wait_for_applying: Please wait {remainingMinutes} minutes before using another template.
errors.confirmation_timeout: You are did not confirm the action in time. The template was not applied.
errors.dms_disabled: I could not send you a DM. Please make sure your DMs are open and try again
errors.missing_highest_role: I do not have the highest role in this server. Please make sure I have the highest role in the server and try again.
errors.missing_bot_permissions: My highest role does not have the `Administrator` permission. Please make sure my highest role has the `Administrator` permission and try again.

use.confirmation_text: I understand the consequences and I want to proceed.

last_chance.message:
{loadingEmoji} Are you sure want to apply the template **{templateName}** to **{guildName}**?
(__THIS IS YOUR LAST CHANCE!__)

use.cancelled: {checkEmoji} You are cancelled the action in time. The template was not applied.
steps: {loadingEmoji} Applying the template **{templateName}** to **{guildName}**. Please wait..
{loadingEmoji} Removing all channels and roles.. This may take a while. Estimated time: **{estimatedTime}**.
{loadingEmoji} Creating channels and roles.. This may take a while. Estimated time: **${estimatedTime}**.
{checkEmoji} The template **{templateName}** has been successfully applied to **{guildName}**.

warning.title: Template {templateName} | ID: {templateId}
warning.description:
### Hold on!
You are about to use the template **{templateName}** in this server.

__**What will happen?**__
- All channels will be deleted.
- All roles will be deleted.
- All webhooks will be deleted.
- All settings will be reset.

__**Are you sure?**__
This action is irreversible and cannot be undone.

__**Please type the following to confirm:**__
`I understand the consequences and I want to proceed.`

__**Note:**__
Do not forget to __reply__ this message with the above text to confirm the action.

success.title: Template {templateId}
success.description:
{checkEmoji} Template **{templateName}** has been successfully applied to **{guildName}** by {user}.

__**What now?**__
- You can delete this channel.
- You can start using the server.
